title: Vandana Shiva: “THIS Is How We Beat The Great Reset"
description:
Renowned environmental activist and author, Vandana Shiva, joined me at our first ever live  community event in Hay-On-Wye. We spoke about how the mainstream media have framed the Dutch Farmer protests, the hidden land grab agenda and how data is not the highest evidence for living, a good healthy body is!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Register for The Free Prescreening of ‘The Seeds Of Vandana Shiva’ here: https://core.live/movies/the-seeds-of-vandana-shiva

title: We Have Been Lied To...
description:
I’ve been talking to the award-winning journalist Aaron Maté, who says it's a market for the U.S. Having all these new states in NATO means that all these states are obligated to be up to NATO standards, buying weapons, predominantly in the US. 
#NATO #War #ukraine #russia  

Aaron's Twitter: https://twitter.com/aaronjmate
Aaron's Substack: https://mate.substack.com/
